window.onload = function(){const btn = document.querySelector('#sumBtn'); const input1 = document.querySelector('#input1'); const input2 = document.querySelector('#input2'); let sumAux = 0;btn.addEventListener('click', ()=>{const sum = document.querySelector('#sum'); sumAux = parseInt(input1.value) + parseInt(input2.value);    sum.innerHTML = sumAux;})}

window.onload = function(){const btn = document.querySelector('#sumBtn'); const input1 = document.querySelector('#input1'); const input2 = document.querySelector('#input2'); let sumAux = 0;btn.addEventListener('click', ()=>{const sum = document.querySelector('#sum'); sumAux = parseInt(input1.value) + parseInt(input2.value);    sum.innerHTML = sumAux;})}
